{"blocks":[{"key":"59auj","text":"Add three 3 mm hardened carbon steel beads to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3958h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ba50t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"322en","text":"Beads are usually shipped coated in manufacturing oil (especially the carbon steel beads). ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4co38","text":"Two lysis options are presented below. One standard protocol using Proteinase K to lyse a subsample of each trap (this may reduce detectable diversity but increases efficiency), and the other uses papain (a cheap alternative to Proteinase K) to lyse whole samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnd7d","text":"Set a pan trap at approximately the same height as the surrounding vegetation. {"blocks":[{"key":"bnesb","text":"Fill the traps with water containing detergent to reduce surface tension. Leave the traps out for 72 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87t2t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97gqo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cdhhq","text":"Standardise the volume of soapy water across traps but ensure it is sufficient to avoid evaporation yet not so much as to make overflow likely.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b35s0","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"48aqv","text":"Ensure appropriate permissions are in place for the site. {"blocks":[{"key":"5ol5t","text":"Pour the trap contents through a sterilised funnel into a suitably sized pot labelled with all necessary sample information for transport to the laboratory. {"blocks":[{"key":"5h40n","text":"Directly from the freezer, grind the bulk samples in a Geno/Grinder at full speed (1750 RPM) for 4 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ftag","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"55a2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4mvpn","text":"If the sample is not fully homogenised, repeat this step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dm9b","text":"Take a subsample of 1 mL lysate from the supernatant and transfer it to a 2.2 mL 96-well plate. {"blocks":[{"key":"bv1b9","text":"Vortex each sample to mix and incubate at 37 °C overnight (12-16 hours).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn50b","text":"Vortex to mix and centrifuge at 4,000 x g for 4 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"boin7","text":"Centrifuge at 4,000 x g for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
